ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: happened to my husbands druid. (didnt change his bind point but did drop him into lava,) once from najeena and once from sol a... He got a res and we continued
ygData.messageBody:
happened to my husbands druid. (didnt change his bind
point but did drop him into lava,) once from najeena
and once from sol a... He got a res and we continued
on our merry way. Both times he was taking damage
when he entered the zone point. We thoerorized that
was the cause, based on those experiences and talking
to our other friends.

Hehe, maybe its only druids... (j/k)

--- Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:
> Last night when my party zoned into Lavastorm from
> Najena our druid was teleported into a lava pool in
> the far North side of the zone.
>
